# Overview


## Getting Started

We will first load the required packages using the below code chunk. We will start off by using [*ggstatsplot*](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/ggstatsplot/index.html) and [*tidyverse*](https://www.tidyverse.org/packages/)


```{r}
packages = c('tidyverse','ggstatsplot')
for(p in packages){
  if(!require(p, character.only = T)){
    install.packages(p)
  }
  library(p, character.only = T)
}
```
## Importing data

```{r}
exam <- read_csv("data/Exam_data.csv")

```
